name: Dot Time
description:
With the Dot Nation's Fate certainly sealed. The Dots hatch a desperate plan to change their fate. Using the Time-agon you must kill the Square King. Changing your fate!!!

Made in A Jame about Time  in 9 days

Controls:

-Arrows or WASD for movement 

-Z for Time-phase (Unlocks in game)

-Left Click for Freeze Time(Unlocks in game)

-Space for placing Rewind points and again to Rewind(Unlocks in game)

-X for removing Rewind Points(Unlocks in game)

-Right Click for summoning  a Time Platform(Unlocks in game)
